website_summaries.verdict: If you need a trim tie case for traveling with space for up to 4 ties and some tie extras, this one won't stress your budget.
pros: Slim design can organize 3 or 4 ties yet doesn't take up too much space
Has a separate pouch for storing tie clips or other accessories
cons: Some ties will have to be folded to fit
Interior tie straps are flimsy and prone to breaking

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're traveling with ties
customer_reviews.text: Took this on several interviews, great for holding about 3 ties (2 skinny and one regular width, along with tie clips). The one downside is because the ties sit in the case folded, they can have a bit of a crease when unpacking, especially if they are a Material other than silk. The case itself was slim and professional, and fit well into my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Magictodoor Tie Case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one Magictodoor tie case and one. I had to bring a substantial amount of ties to keep things rotated. I received the tie case last week,and I really like this compact tie case's pros. Pros - Firm and not flimsy - Secures with zipper to prevent from ties from coming out of the sleeve - Nice size to be able to store in the travel suitcase PLEASE click ' “YES” ' below if you found this review to be helpful
customer_reviews.author: Cxr

customer_reviews.title: he loved the idea of keeping all his ties and accessories ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, he loved the idea of keeping all his ties and accessories together it's own case. He is very tall so we have to adjust slightly so he doesn't zip up the tie. Cool travel gift. Would recommend to the business traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent Tye travel case. The only issue is that if you put in more than two ties there are some snaps and heading inside that will leave an impression on the time if you don’t fold it correctly. Otherwise it’s built well and I should get a few years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly...

customer_reviews.title: I have been meaning on getting a tie wallet for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning on getting a tie wallet for years, kept putting it off. Then I ruined a tie on travel with creases. While there are others, this one was reasonably priced and a convenient size. It also hold collar stays and shirt jewellery. I have used it twice and it works for me. enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Allex

customer_reviews.title: but looks like it will do a good job on my next ...
customer_reviews.text: just received it , haven't used it , but looks like it will do a good job on my next trip - given that some of my ties cost over USD 200 each this seems like a great way to keep them clean and safe in my case
customer_reviews.author: simon powell

customer_reviews.title: The write up on this indicates can easily hold up to 4 ties
customer_reviews.text: The write up on this indicates can easily hold up to 4 ties. Well technically, 2 ties is "up to" but there is no way that it could hold 4 normal men's ties. Bow or string ties sure I could see that. But it isn't the elastic that is the problem, the zipper won't close on 4 ties. Also, the snap broke on one of the bands the first time I tried it so very disappointed and will be returning it and replace with a different product
customer_reviews.author: chris kraft

customer_reviews.title: Is not what expect to keep nice ties in it.
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality. No good looking. It does not keep the rectangular shape.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Osers

customer_reviews.title: Keeps 4 Ties in Good Condition
customer_reviews.text: Easily holds 4 ties and keeps them nice during travel. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: LovesToRead

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Good material. No problems except I wish it was smaller
customer_reviews.author: AL212NY

customer_reviews.title: GREAT gift for the a person who wears neckties.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great! This was a gift. It was a hit. Product is great quality. Holds large neckties really well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my best friends birthday
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my best friends birthday. I was very impressed when I opened it. The ties fit in it good and now when he travels he can put his ties in here to protect them. It appears to be made good and is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Broke before the first use!
customer_reviews.text: My husband unsnapped the strap to hold his tie in place and it broke. The other side of the snap came off of the case before the first use!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carol

customer_reviews.title: For Regular and Bow Ties
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case to pack regular and/or bow ties. It's sturdy and keeps everything nicely in place without wrinkles. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: A Romero

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift - Travels all over the world on business - wanted a tie case for him that would protect ties and not take up space.
customer_reviews.author: LAL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but will not easily hold 4 ties without wrinkling.
customer_reviews.author: L F

customer_reviews.title: Great travel case for ties
customer_reviews.text: Great travel case for ties! Holds the ties in place snug and secure. I only packed on on each side but it seems as if u can add a lot more. A Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pinto-Bedoya

customer_reviews.title: so useful
customer_reviews.text: so easy and useful to travel with ties! no more worries!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Tie traveler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son in law for Christmas. I was not sure which travel tie case he would like best this flat e or the round one so I ordered both. It will be interesting to see which one he likes the best
customer_reviews.author: Janice McCart

customer_reviews.title: but it's better than having them in stock in a pocket in ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband's ties were longer than what would fit, but it's better than having them in stock in a pocket in the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: G8R4EVR

customer_reviews.title: which was good. I haven't used it but I think he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. Longer than I thought it would be, which was good. I haven't used it but I think he will like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Piper

customer_reviews.title: would be great if it was able to hold more ties for ...
customer_reviews.text: The case itself his made of a durable material that will weather many trips. It will only hold 2 ties if only folded once. An okay case, would be great if it was able to hold more ties for the longer trips.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Didn't pay attention to size dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Love the case, but they don't hold Big and Tall ties as well as standard ties.
customer_reviews.author: karizona

customer_reviews.title: Magictodoor Travel Tie Case
customer_reviews.text: Great case to hold your ties and a couple tie tacks while traveling, it easily accommodates four ties
customer_reviews.author: G. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, but I wish it was easier to fit multiple ties in the elastic bands
customer_reviews.author: Darren Chiu

customer_reviews.title: I hope they like it and use it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to someone as a gift. I hope they like it and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holding four ties is a bit of a stretch. It held two perfectly and three was pushing it.
customer_reviews.author: Silmaril

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Too small fir two ties. They are cramped and the rubber bands leave marks - I hadnto iron the ties afterwards which kinda defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: entchepl

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality item
customer_reviews.text: One of the snaps came off the first time I undid it. Very poor quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit short for my standard length ties, folded into thirds
customer_reviews.author: Brandon E. Paluzzi

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift and they thought it was Nice and different
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and they thought it was Nice and different!
customer_reviews.author: Krystina

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but will soon on trip to Rome and Med cruise. Good size and Nice finish!
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is great but would be nice if it had a pocket for cufflinks and collar stays.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Keep Ties Organized
customer_reviews.text: The travel tie case arrived quickly, looks and works just as advertised. I'm able to put 2 ties on each side of the elastic bands, total of 4 ties. It helps prevents the ties from getting wrinkly and keeps them neat when putting them in the suitcase or carryon bag when I'm traveling. At the price, it is great to have, it is functional accessory for men. The tie case is made of hard nylon but it is sturdy enough for storing ties. I received this tie case at a discount price in exchange for an honest unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: UNIQUE
